strow.stentry: Time Zone specified at deployment time is displayed.

Country setting determines some Telephony Server default settings. The country that is displayed is derived from the timezone that you specified during deployment. If an "Other" country is chosen for the Country setting, the wizard will only partially configure the system. Additional manual configuration will be required after initial deployment.

The Telecom Region determines the system's phone numbering plan and default system language. The region that is displayed is derived by ICW from the timezone that you specified during deployment. The region will default to North America if this Wizard was unable to derive a region from the timezone.
IP address or FQDN of the MiVoice Business telephony server (also known as the MiVB address) specified during deployment. The value is pre-filled.
MiVB licensing key specified during deployment. The value is pre-filled.
MiCollab licensing key specified during deployment. The value is pre-filled.
MBG licensing key specified during deployment. The value is pre-filled.
MiCollab IP address or FQDN specified during deployment. The value is pre-filled.
MBG IP address or FQDN specified during deployment. The value is pre-filled.

note.p: If necessary, you can select a different Time Zone, Country, and Telecom Region. If you select a Time zone that is not within one of Countries supported by the system, the Country value is set to "Other" and the Telecom Region is defaulted to North America.
Configure Resiliency, is enabled by default. If you do not want to setup Resiliency you can clear the check box.
